pr_title: [openwebnet] Fixes #8524 and #8547, updated openwebnet4j lib to 0.3.1. Updated README

timeline.message:
[openwebnet] fixes #8524 and #8547, updated openwebnet4j lib to 0.3.1, update README

Signed-off-by: Massimo Valla <mvcode00@gmail.com>

timeline.body:
`Map.get()` returns null if the key doesn't exist. You could simply do:
```suggestion
        return registeredDevices.get(ownId);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Map.get() returns null if the key doesn't exist. You could simply do:

Suggested change
if (registeredDevices.containsKey(ownId)) {
return registeredDevices.get(ownId);
} else {
return null;
}
return registeredDevices.get(ownId);
timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText:
fixed.
Could you also set this PR label (bug) so it gets tracked in the changelog? (apparently I cannot set label to my PR request), thanks.
